ca.keefer.sanemethod.Environment
Class AbstractEnvironment

java.lang.Object
  ca.keefer.sanemethod.Environment.AbstractEnvironment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Environment
Direct Known Subclasses:
TiledEnvironment
public abstract class AbstractEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
implements Environment

The common bits of all environments. Holds a physics world, allows addition of entities and their phyiscal representation.

Author:
Kevin Glass, Christopher Keefer
